attributes.action: Support the proposal to update the wording of the UN Declaration of Human Rights to reflect contemporary society
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The petitioners seek the Prime Minister's support in proposing the following changes to the wording of the UN Declaration of Human Rights:
1)Preamble, paragraph 3: replace "man" with "mankind".
2)Preamble, paragraph 5: replace "men and women" with "people of different genders"
3)Article 1: replace "spirit of brotherhood" with "team spirit"
4)Article 2: replace "sex" with "gender".
5)Articles 10, 11.1, 12, 13.2, 15.2, 16.1, 16.3, 17.2, 18, 21, 22, 23.3, 24.4, 25.1, 25.2, 27.2, 29.1 and 29.2: add female gender pronouns and articles. 
6)Article 16(3): replace "family is the natural and" with "individual is the".
7)Article 25(2): replace "Motherhood and childhood" with "vulnerable people".
